about.title: About
about.description:
I have experience as a <1>software engineer</1>, currently working as a <1>fullstack developer</1>, but with a greater emphasis on back-end.

I am <1>graduating in Computer Engineering< /1> from UEFS and <1>Systems Development Technician</1> from SENAI. I am a person driven to solve problems, always seeking and learning new solutions.

I have experience in developing <1>Restful APIs< /1> using frameworks such as Laravel and Node.JS, as well as experience in building <1>responsive websites</1> using technologies such as React (in addition to pure HTML and CSS). I also work with <1>relational databases</1>, mainly PostgreSQL and MySQL, like this experience with other languages such as Python and C++.

golfarma.description: Pharmaceutical distributor, focused on the Bahian market (Bahia is a state in Brazil). It started investing in technology at the end of 2019 to adapt to the more technological market. I worked on the development, creation and maintenance of restful APIs and databases. I also had the experience and responsibility for contacting customers directly for problem solving and system implementation. At Golfarma I used technologies such as PHP (Laravel) and SQL (SQL Server and PostgreSQL).

geodatin.description: Company focused on systems development, combining data intelligence and geoinformation. I worked on the development, creation and maintenance of Restful API and databases, as well as the implementation of responsive pages, in addition to creating web scraping to extract public data . At Geodatin I used technologies such as Node.JS (Typescript, Express, Typeorm), React (Styled-components, Material-UI), Python (Selenium, Beautifulsoup), PostegreSQL, Redis, Docker, Github Actions.

ppbio.title: PPBio
ppbio.description: PPBio (Priority Bioeconomy Program in Portuguese) is a platform to raise investment resources to generate new products, services and businesses for the Amazon Bioeconomy. I worked as Back-end and Scrum Master.

rhisa.title: Rhisa
rhisa.description: Rhisa (Human Resources and Intelligence Network for Sustainability in the Amazon in Portuguese) is a platform to connect researchers from the Legal Amazon. I worked as Back-end, developing the API and the Crawler that feeds the database.

leadbase.title: LeadBase
leadbase.description: LeadBase is a platform for data management and analysis focused on the pharmaceutical sector. I participated in the project when they were still part of Golfarma. Posteriorly, the project became an independent startup. I worked as back-end, developing the API and database.
